items.name: As a controller developer, I would like deploy an EntandoDatabaseService that merely references an externally provisioned database service so that I can leverage an existing user database
As a controller developer, I would like request a DBMS Capability to be deployed on demand so that I don't need to concern myself with the details o deploying a DBMS server
As a deployer, I would like to deploy an EntandoDatabaseService directly so that I have more granular control over the configuration settings
As a controller developer, I would like request a capability that will allow me to use an external database service so that I can leverage existing database infrastructure
